question: When you pull from a repository, what two actions happen?

answers.feedback: Correct, pull fetches the files from the remote repository.
Correct, files are merged into the local repository when fetched from the remote.
Incorrect, a pull request remains in the same branch,
Incorrect, local files are only commited with the commit command.
Incorrect, local files are added only with the add command.

question: git push -u origin main, makes code on a public repository available to others.

answers.feedback: Correct, push copies commits from the local repository to the remote repository.
Incorrect, code is available on public repository.
